patthana7.4:1.1: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.4:2.1: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.4:3.1: Naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana7.4:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
